release_notes: Mainnet build setup and related bugfixes

Performance Improvements
Add Ravencoin wallet
Add Push Notifications Support
Add Security Settings Screen
Add additional authentication options
Add change password form
Add profile update form
Allow fulfillment of contact transactions
Allow updating of PIN
Fix some btc send errors
Use phone-pad keyboard for Signup phone input

Add progress bar to loading screen
Add in-app messaging
Add preliminary support for internationalization
Adjust loading screen and app icons
Pull release notes into to release notes page
Allow fulfillment of contact transactions from transaction history
Give support ticket description a minimum height
